text: Nihsansaya, amhi apalya paigambaranna (sandesavahakanna) spasta nisanya de'una pathavile ani tyancyasobata grantha ani n'yaya (taraju) avatarita kela, yasathi ki lokanni n'yayavarakayama rahave ani amhi lokhandahi avatarita kele, jyata mothi (haibata ani) takada ahe ani lokansathi itarahi aneka phayade aheta ani yasathihi ki allahane he januna ghyave ki tyaci va tyacya paigambaranci madata na pahata kona karato. Nihsansaya, allaha motha saktisali ani varcasvasali ahe
